snippet.title: Last Mech Standing Official Trailer - Story and Gameplay
snippet.description:
Last Mech Standing is a rogue-like, arcade-style shoot-them-up VR game. Colossal monsters, called Behemoths, have laid waste to cities across the world. You are the pilot of the Crimson Slayer, the last giant mech and humanity’s last hope. 
---------
Official Website:  https://lastmechstanding.crimson-forge.com/
Discord Community: https://discord.com/invite/9MHGeVA4wY
App Lab: https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/5368399519912662/
---------

Behemoths have invaded and flattened cities all over the world. Humanity is on the brink of extinction. You are the pilot of Crimson Slayer, the world’s largest and most powerful mech, and the last mech standing.

You are Victor Petrov. A highly decorated, retired War Hero in the fictional world of Last Mech Standing. The State runs all matters in the country. It is a militaristic, authoritarian government.

Two years ago, your daughter was killed in a terrorist bombing, hence you took a leave of absence. That changed when the Behemoths invaded and laid waste to millions of lives. You have been called back into service. 

The People’s Army resisted but ultimately the Behemoths proved too powerful. Military engineers developed mechs to counter the Behemoths. Many failed as the pilots were not strong or brave enough. You however, proved much more resilient. So they built the world’s strongest, biggest mech - the Crimson Slayer. And you are its pilot. The only one who can defeat the Behemoths.

As you cleave your way past countless Behemoths, slowly you begin to discover their true origins. Your daughter’s death may not be what it seems. The Behemoth Queen reaches out to you, and reveals the truth about you, your daughter and the origins of the monsters.
